pkgmetadata.longdescription:
# geosparkThis library is Python wrapper on GeoSpark library.GeoSpark is a cluster computing system for processing large-scale spatial data. GeoSpark extends Apache Spark / SparkSQL with a set of out-of-the-box Spatial Resilient Distributed Datasets (SRDDs)/ SpatialSQL that efficiently load, process, and analyze large-scale spatial data across machines.Python version supports:
  • GeoSpark core
  • GeoSpark SQL
    • Please follow tutorial on official GeoSpark website:https://datasystemslab.github.io/GeoSpark/
